question: Tarikh-i-Firuz Shahi provides the evidences of which of the following dynasties?
explanation: Tarikh-i-Firuz Shahi written byÂ Ziauddin Barani is an important historical source for the Tughlaq dynasty. It gives detailed accounts of the reigns of Ghiyasuddin Tughlaq, Muhammad bin Tughlaq, and Firuz Shah Tughlaq.
